citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
-A male yorkie's (DOB 12-18-2019, ID #33) left 3 upper incisor (front) teeth were loose to the touch and its incisors had
receded gums by the tooth roots. Teeth that are loose to the touch with receded gum lines are a sign of dental disease
and can cause a dog discomfort and health problems. To prevent discomfort and health problems, ensure to have this
dog evaluated by a veterinarian and treated per veterinarian recommendations.
***Correct by 7/15/2023.
-An expired bottle of calcium 23% solution (Exp 5/2022) was stored and ready for use and per licensee has been used
this year. Expired medications might not be effective as intended or in some cases can cause animals to become sick.
Ensure to check medications on a regular basis and ensure non-expired medications are used.
***Correct by 7/7/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
-A male yorkie's (DOB 12-18-2019, ID #33) left 3 upper incisor (front) teeth were loose to the touch and its incisors had 
receded gums by the tooth roots. Teeth that are loose to the touch with receded gum lines are a sign of dental disease 
and can cause a dog discomfort and health problems. To prevent discomfort and health problems, ensure to have this 
dog evaluated by a veterinarian and treated per veterinarian recommendations.  
***Correct by 7/15/2023. 
 
-An expired bottle of calcium 23% solution (Exp 5/2022) was stored and ready for use and per licensee has been used 
this year. Expired medications might not be effective as intended or in some cases can cause animals to become sick. 
Ensure to check medications on a regular basis and ensure non-expired medications are used.  
***Correct by 7/7/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
